scripts.update-schemas: concurrently 'quicktype -o src/schemas/manifest.ts -t manifest --src-lang schema https://schemas.getdbt.com/dbt/manifest/v6.json' 'quicktype -o src/schemas/catalog.ts -t catalog --src-lang schema https://schemas.getdbt.com/dbt/catalog/v1.json'
scripts.serve: make all && concurrently 'cd dist/original && ../../.venv/bin/python -m http.server --bind 0.0.0.0 8081' 'cd dist/supercharged && ../../.venv/bin/python -m http.server --bind 0.0.0.0 8082'
scripts.serve-gzip: make all && concurrently 'cd dist/original && ../../.venv/bin/python -m httpcompressionserver --bind 0.0.0.0 8081' 'cd dist/supercharged && ../../.venv/bin/python -m httpcompressionserver --bind 0.0.0.0 8082'
